column4: Can anyone help we get WEP working on ubuntu? I've tried using the gui thingy but it just doesnt work. I've looked through some of the troubleshooting guides and I dont even know where to start...
what card?
do you know the chipset?
http://linux-wless.passys.nl can you check?
atheros is a chipset
lemme open firefox on my other comp
then my chipset is Atheros AR5001X+
lsmod | grep madwifi
what comes up?
if it's long, dont post it in-channel, but it should be short
should I reboot into linux?
yeah you have to run the command from there
thats to see if the madwifi driver is loaded
I ran the command and nothing came up
modprobe "madwifi"
ack, no quotes
I tried modprobe madwifi and it said
can you connect wired from your ubuntu partition to avoid having to reboot?
they lack ethernet?
I found out what card I have
my card is umm... this AR5212 802.11abg NIC
you should use madwifi
